events.name: Bible Study
events.description: Join us every Monday for Bible Study in the Phase 8 Clubhouse!

events.name: Inquiry
events.description: Inquiry is a place for anyone from any background to come and ask questions about the Catholic faith, Catholic view on worldly topics, and how to communicate beliefs. It is a circle of conversation to help each other learn and be able to articulate your beliefs with trained Catechists to assist with accuracy in theology. It's a great way to learn more, and invite your friends to do the same.

events.name: Prayer on Campus
events.description: Join us in praying the Rosary at the TI Plaza every Wednesday!

events.name: Men's Small Group
events.description: Men's Small Group is a two hour period each week where the men of NCM come together to share in community, food, and prayer. During this time we reflect on the gospel for the week and discuss the topics that are on the hearts and minds of young men of faith today.

events.name: Women's Small Group
events.description: Women's Small Group is a weekly activity where the ladies in NCM meet to have a ladies talk. We have discussions about several topics related to our faith and us. And there's always desserts!

events.name: All Saints' Day Rides to Mass
events.description: All Saints' Day is a holy day of obligation, so we will be providing rides to mass on Friday! We will meet up behind Hoblitzelle Hall at around 6:30 p.m.

events.name: All Hallows' Eve Party
events.description: Come join us for mass on campus, followed afterwards by a party to celebrate All Hallows' Eve (Halloween). Confession starts at 4:30 p.m.

events.name: Sunday Dinner
events.description: Comets, you made it through the week! Treat yourself to free food and fellowship.
